entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
